verses.name: Jeremiah 33:21
verses.text: Then may also my covenant be broken with David my servant, that he should not have a son to reign upon his throne; and with the Levites the priests, my ministers.

verses.name: Jeremiah 33:22
verses.text: As the host of heaven cannot be numbered, neither the sand of the sea measured: so will I multiply the seed of David my servant, and the Levites that minister unto me.

verses.name: Jeremiah 33:23
verses.text: Moreover the word of the Lord came to Jeremiah, saying,
